title: Repentant: The Road to Hell
description: Condemned to hell for the sins of man, Chase Romano must suffer extreme torments akin to those he inflicted in life, in hopes of deliverance from the Fallen One.Charged with the duty of guiding Chase through his trials in hell, Edison Rowley, an anagogic scholar, sees his young ward as the path to the Morning Star’s light.Focused and independent after the end of their relationship, Heather Andresen’s wounds reopen when she learns of Chase’s death. She doesn’t realize that because of her connection to him, her decisions may have unforeseen consequences.Repentant is a suspenseful tale of love and horror that explores a darker, more tangible hell, taking place within a twisted reality of New York City.
author: J.G. Koratzanis
